sentence: The lawsuit has been assigned to U.S. District Court Judge Susan Brnovich, wife of Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, a Senate candidate and ally of former President Donald Trump.
author: Chelsey Cox
title: Arizona GOP Chair Kelli Ward, spouse, sue to block Jan. 6 panel from accessing phone records

sentence: According to Politico, the Wards’ lawsuit has been assigned to U.S. District Court Judge Susan Brnovich, the wife of Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich — an ally of former President Donald Trump who is running for Senate.
author: Cristina Cabrera
title: Jan. 6 Committee Subpoenas Arizona GOP Chair And Her Husband’s Phone Records

sentence: The lawsuit has been assigned to U.S. District Court Judge Susan Brnovich, wife of Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, a Senate candidate and ally of former President Donald Trump.
author: Chelsey Cox
title: Arizona GOP Chair Kelli Ward, spouse, sue to block Jan. 6 panel from accessing phone records

sentence: Shortly after the 2020 presidential election Attorney General Mark Brnovich appeared on Fox Business, where he was asked about unsubstantiated claims of election fraud in Arizona.
author: EJ Montini
title: Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich's election fraud investigation turns up bupkis

sentence: “The lackluster Attorney General of Arizona, Mark Brnovich, has to get on the ball and catch up with the great Republican patriots in the Arizona State Senate,” Trump added.
author: Steve Benen
title: Arizona AG fails to produce the election evidence Trump demanded
